mapper.select: SELECT countrycode as countryCode, businesstype as businessType, clienttype as clientType, organization as organization, logintype as loginType, account_id as id, account_password as password FROM useraccount WHERE user_id = UNHEX(REPLACE(#{userId}, '-', '')) LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BankAccount ( user_id, bank_name, account_num, account_type, balance ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{bankName}, #{accountNum}, #{accountType}, #{balance} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE bank_name = VALUES(bank_name), account_type = VALUES(account_type), balance = VALUES(balance)
